name: d3-contour
description: Compute contour polygons using marching squares.

0.0.1.name: d3-contour
0.0.1.description: Compute contour lines using marching squares.

scripts.pretest: rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup --banner "$(preamble)" -f umd -n d3 -o build/d3-contour.js -- index.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && uglifyjs --preamble "$(preamble)" build/d3-contour.js -c -m -o build/d3-contour.min.js
scripts.postpublish: git push && git push --tags && cd ../d3.github.com && git pull && cp ../d3-contour/build/d3-contour.js d3-contour.v0.0.js && cp ../d3-contour/build/d3-contour.min.js d3-contour.v0.0.min.js && git add d3-contour.v0.0.js d3-contour.v0.0.min.js && git commit -m "d3-contour ${npm_package_version}" && git push && cd - && zip -j build/d3-contour.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/d3-contour.js build/d3-contour.min.js

1.0.0.name: d3-contour
1.0.0.description: Compute contour polygons using marching squares.

scripts.pretest: rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup --banner "$(preamble)" -f umd -n d3 -g d3-array:d3 -o build/d3-contour.js -- index.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && uglifyjs --preamble "$(preamble)" build/d3-contour.js -c -m -o build/d3-contour.min.js
scripts.postpublish: git push && git push --tags && cd ../d3.github.com && git pull && cp ../d3-contour/build/d3-contour.js d3-contour.v1.js && cp ../d3-contour/build/d3-contour.min.js d3-contour.v1.min.js && git add d3-contour.v1.js d3-contour.v1.min.js && git commit -m "d3-contour ${npm_package_version}" && git push && cd - && zip -j build/d3-contour.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/d3-contour.js build/d3-contour.min.js

1.1.0.name: d3-contour
1.1.0.description: Compute contour polygons using marching squares.

scripts.pretest: rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup --banner "$(preamble)" -f umd -n d3 -g d3-array:d3 -o build/d3-contour.js -- index.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && uglifyjs --preamble "$(preamble)" build/d3-contour.js -c -m -o build/d3-contour.min.js
scripts.postpublish: git push && git push --tags && cd ../d3.github.com && git pull && cp ../d3-contour/build/d3-contour.js d3-contour.v1.js && cp ../d3-contour/build/d3-contour.min.js d3-contour.v1.min.js && git add d3-contour.v1.js d3-contour.v1.min.js && git commit -m "d3-contour ${npm_package_version}" && git push && cd - && zip -j build/d3-contour.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/d3-contour.js build/d3-contour.min.js

1.1.1.name: d3-contour
1.1.1.description: Compute contour polygons using marching squares.

scripts.pretest: rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup --banner "$(preamble)" -f umd -n d3 -g d3-array:d3 -o build/d3-contour.js -- index.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && uglifyjs -b beautify=false,preamble="'$(preamble)'" build/d3-contour.js -c -m -o build/d3-contour.min.js
scripts.postpublish: git push && git push --tags && cd ../d3.github.com && git pull && cp ../d3-contour/build/d3-contour.js d3-contour.v1.js && cp ../d3-contour/build/d3-contour.min.js d3-contour.v1.min.js && git add d3-contour.v1.js d3-contour.v1.min.js && git commit -m "d3-contour ${npm_package_version}" && git push && cd - && zip -j build/d3-contour.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/d3-contour.js build/d3-contour.min.js

1.1.2.name: d3-contour
1.1.2.description: Compute contour polygons using marching squares.

scripts.prepublish: npm run test && uglifyjs -b beautify=false,preamble="'$(preamble)'" build/d3-contour.js -c -m -o build/d3-contour.min.js
scripts.postpublish: git push && git push --tags && cd ../d3.github.com && git pull && cp ../d3-contour/build/d3-contour.js d3-contour.v1.js && cp ../d3-contour/build/d3-contour.min.js d3-contour.v1.min.js && git add d3-contour.v1.js d3-contour.v1.min.js && git commit -m "d3-contour ${npm_package_version}" && git push && cd - && zip -j build/d3-contour.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/d3-contour.js build/d3-contour.min.js
